text: The Great Problem is a 1916 American silent drama film directed by Rex Ingram and starring Violet Mersereau, Dan Hanlon and Lionel Adams.Gmür p.261 It marked Ingram's directorial debut of a feature film, having previously made a short. It was shot at Fort Lee in New Jersey. ==Cast== * Violet Mersereau as Peggy Carson * Dan Hanlon as Bill Carson * Lionel Adams as George Devereaux * Kittens Reichert as Peggy - as a child * William J. Dyer as Skinny McGee * Mathilde Brundage as Mrs. Devereaux * Howard Crampton as Joseph ==References== ==Bibliography== * Leonhard Gmür.
